hero.part1: Turning ideas into real life products
hero.subtitle: I craft premium websites for creators, entrepreneurs and startups who want to convert clients, drive serious revenue and stand out in an ever-crowding market.

letter.part1: Front-end engineer with over 5+ years of experience in building creative websites, interactive experiences, and custom web software.
letter.part2: Hey I'm Hugo, a creative front-end engineer based in Nice, France. I'm passionate about creating incredible user experiences with web technology.
letter.part3: I specialize in programming with Nuxt, although I have a wide range of full-stack development experience. I love writing code, but I also have experience in UX consulting, with a keen eye for detail and an understanding of interaction design and best practices.
letter.part4: I've worked on many projects where I got in early in the discovery process, guiding and designing the UX from the ground up, then I got to work to build it.
